wpt.name: GC1820K
wpt.desc: Drake's 322 Break Cache by WhiteClayLover, Traditional Cache (2/1.5)

groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:name: Drake's 322 Break Cache
groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:short_description: A kid and dog friendly cache in Spatola Memorial Park.
groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:long_description: My Gordon Setter Drake is my constant companion on caching runs. Since we have been traveling between Downingtown and Ephrata a few times lately, we decided it was time to place a cache along 322 to help others with kids and dogs that might enjoy a little leg stretch along the way. This is an ammo can painted brown. It should be a pretty easy find!
groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:encoded_hints: rocky hide not far from the pile of rrts

groundspeak:log.groundspeak:text: Good path selection is handy for avoiding prickers. Found with dawnie22 and 19acassel.
Picked up the Right Shoe...start walking travel bug
